price: (19) And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded[1939] –
arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعۡمَةٖ تُجۡزَىٰٓ
footnotes: [1939]- i.e., without intending reciprocation for some benefit to himself.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamā li-aḥadin ʿindahu min niʿ'matin tuj'zā
